thread.title: NFL Network Broadcasts Naked Bengals Locker Room
thread.title_full: NFL Network Broadcasts Naked Bengals Locker Room | Complex

author: Maurice Peebles
title: NFL Network Broadcasts Naked Bengals Locker Room
text:
After beating the Buffalo Bills and keeping their undefeated season alive, some members of the Cincinnati Bengals got more exposure than they bargained for. And by "more exposure" we mean their butts and dongs exposed on national television.
NFL Network broadcasted the above interview of Adam "Pacman" Jones, completely ignoring the half-naked and briefly fully naked players clearly visible in the background.
Sure, Adam Jones is a pro football player with multiple arrests who technically once beat Sting and Kurt Angle for a tag team championship, but maybe the interview can wait a few minutes until everybody's junk is covered next time?
[via TPS ]
